# Online Business Solutions

This website offers a streamlined process to help local businesses establish their online presence swiftly and professionally through affordable web development services. It caters primarily to small business owners who need effective, mobile-friendly websites without any technical jargon or surprises.

## About Me

This page outlines the straightforward process followed to get businesses online in four easy steps: 

1. **Discovery Call**: A brief 15-minute chat to understand business goals.
2. **Content & Design**: The website is built using the client's content and brand, with one round of changes allowed for review.
3. **Launch**: The site goes live within five business days.
4. **Ongoing Support**: Clients receive 30 days of post-launch support for any questions or needs.

### What You Can Expect

- **No Jargon**: Explanations in plain English.
- **Fixed Pricing**: No surprise invoices for WordPress projects.
- **Real Experience**: Over 27 years in tech and 18+ years in web development.
- **Ongoing Support**: Continued availability for client queries.

### Links

- [Get Your Business Online](/services)
- [View My Work](/projects)

## Contact

The contact page invites potential clients to initiate conversations about their projects. Users can send a message regarding their needs or schedule a free 15-minute discovery call.

### Get in Touch

- Input fields for User Name, Email, and Project Description.
- **Alternative Contact Methods**: 
  - Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
  - GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
  - LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

## Services

This section details the available services, emphasizing transparent pricing and professional results.

### $500 WordPress Sites

- Quick setup in 5 business days.
- Responsive design optimized for all devices.
- Contact form, basic SEO, and one round of revisions included.
- 30 days of support after launch.

### Custom Web Applications

- Tailored solutions with a modern tech stack.
- Pricing on request.

### Team Growth Accelerator

- Paid mentorship services for developer teams.
- Personalized engagement, including code reviews and best practices.

### What Every WordPress Site Includes

- Mobile-responsive design
- Basic SEO setup
- Contact form integration
- Content training for easy updates

### Frequently Asked Questions

This section addresses common inquiries, including delivery timelines and post-launch support. 

## Thank You Page

This page confirms receipt of inquiries and outlines the next steps in the communication process. It reassures clients about the review and response timeline and encourages them to explore the project portfolio while waiting.
